subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams, the Wimbledon champion, has withdrawn from next week’s Rogers Cup women’s tournament in Montreal with a knee injury. The tournament director, Eugène Lapierre, said Williams did not want to risk aggravating the tendinitis in her knee ahead of the Olympics.
